title: Shooting in Denver leaves 1 dead, 3 wounded
content:
DENVER — Police officials say one person was killed and three others were wounded in a Denver shooting.
Authorities say they have no information about a suspect in Saturday's early morning shooting in the Baker neighborhood.
Jordan Larusso, who lives down the street, tells the Denver Post that he was awakened by gunshots and screams.
The Denver Police Department said on its Twitter webpage that 1 person died and another is in critical condition.
Two other people have non-life-threatening injuries.
The names of the victims have not been released.
